Class OwnTextField

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Disableable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout

    public class OwnTextField
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.TextField
    TextButton in which the cursor changes when the mouse rolls over. It also fixes the size issue.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista
